description: [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) retrieves cryptocurrency mining payloads and commands in encrypted traffic from its command and control server.(Citation: Ensilo Darkgate 2018) [DarkGate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1111) uses Windows Batch scripts executing the curl command to retrieve follow-on payloads.(Citation: Trellix Darkgate 2023)

external_references.description: Adi Zeligson & Rotem Kerner. (2018, November 13). Enter The DarkGate - New Cryptocurrency Mining and Ransomware Campaign. Retrieved February 9, 2024.
Ernesto Fern√°ndez Provecho, Pham Duy Phuc, Ciana Driscoll & Vinoo Thomas. (2023, November 21). The Continued Evolution of the DarkGate Malware-as-a-Service. Retrieved February 9, 2024.
